meanings.definition: The state of being intermediate between male and female in terms of physical or biological characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The intersexualities of some individuals make it challenging to categorize them as strictly male or female.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching the intersexualities of certain species to better understand their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The intersexualities of the twins confused the doctors during the gender reveal party.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork beautifully captures the intersexualities of nature, blending elements of both male and female.
meanings.sent5: The intersexualities of the chameleon allow it to adapt to various environments effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The study or consideration of the relationships between different sexes or genders.
meanings.sent1: The course on intersexualities explores how societal norms influence gender dynamics.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in the field of psychology often delve into intersexualities to understand human behavior better.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously portrayed the intersexualities of dating in the modern world.
meanings.sent4: Her novel delves deep into the intersexualities of love and attraction, revealing complex connections.
meanings.sent5: The documentary sheds light on the intersexualities of gender identity, challenging traditional beliefs.
